entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers mixed with flurries early this morning and ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
